text: Suppose you are asked to design a new reliable byte-stream transport protocol like TCP. This protocol, named myTCP, runs over a 100 Mbps network with Round Trip Time of 150 milliseconds and the maximum segment lifetime of 2 minutes. Which of the following is/are valid lengths of the Sequence Number field in the myTCP header? A. 30 bits B. 32 bits C. 34 bits D. 36 bits gatecse-2023 computer-networks tcp multiple-selects 2-marks
